dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A lot of people think renewable energy projects are just about the environment, but this new Kazakhstan-UAE deal is a massive economic play too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A lot of people think renewable energy projects are just about the environment, but this new Kazakhstan-U A E deal is a massive economic play too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, uh, President Tokayev just ratified that agreement for a huge wind power plant in the Zhambyl region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, absolutely. I mean, uh, President Tokayev just ratified that agreement for a huge wind power plant in the Zhambyl region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev has ratified an agreement between Kazakhstan and the United Arab Emirates, according to Akorda. Earlier, it was reported that a 1 GW wind power plant is planned for construction in the Zhambyl region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it's a one gigawatt facility. That is a serious amount of power. And it's got this smart feature, it can store excess energy for peak demand.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it's a one gigawatt facility. That is a serious amount of power. And it's got this smart feature, it can store excess energy for peak demand.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, it was reported that a 1 GW wind power plant is planned for construction in the Zhambyl region. The facility will be capable of storing excess energy during high wind conditions and supplying it to the grid during peak demand hours, thus enhancing the resilience of the country's Unified Power System.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, which is, like, crucial for grid stability. And the financials are fascinating. They've locked in a price of 4.49 cents per kilowatt-hour for 25 years.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, which is, like, crucial for grid stability. And the financials are fascinating. They've locked in a price of four point four nine cents per kilowatt-hour for twenty five years.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The electricity will be purchased at a rate of 4.49 cents per kWh over a 25-year period, which includes the cost of power lines, storage systems, and project profitability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That seems like a pretty competitive rate, especially when you consider it covers the power lines, the storage, everything. They're building over 400 kilometers of new transmission lines.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That seems like a pretty competitive rate, especially when you consider it covers the power lines, the storage, everything. They're building over four hundred kilometers of new transmission lines.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: More than 400 kilometers of high-voltage power lines will be constructed to connect the wind farm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which, you know, is also about boosting the whole southern grid's capacity. This isn't just one project; it's an upgrade for the entire region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, you know, is also about boosting the whole southern grid's capacity. This isn't just one project; it's an upgrade for the entire region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The project also includes plans to boost the transit capacity of Kazakhstan's southern power grid.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. The scale is enormous. We're talking about attracting something like 1.4 billion dollars in investment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. The scale is enormous. We're talking about attracting something like one point four billion dollars in investment.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The initiative is expected to attract around $1.4 billion in investment, create 1,000 temporary and 100 permanent jobs, and generate 3.4 billion kWh of renewable energy annually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the job creation is significant tooâ€”a thousand temporary jobs and a hundred permanent positions. That's a big deal locally.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the job creation is significant too-a thousand temporary jobs and a hundred permanent positions. That's a big deal locally.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The initiative is expected to attract around $1.4 billion in investment, create 1,000 temporary and 100 permanent jobs, and generate 3.4 billion kWh of renewable energy annually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, the energy output... 3.4 billion kilowatt-hours every year. That's going to power a lot of homes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, the energy output... three point four billion kilowatt-hours every year. That's going to power a lot of homes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The initiative is expected to attract around $1.4 billion in investment, create 1,000 temporary and 100 permanent jobs, and generate 3.4 billion kWh of renewable energy annually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really feels like this was timed with the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince's visit to Astana, like it was a centerpiece of that diplomatic trip.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really feels like this was timed with the Abu Dhabi Crown Prince's visit to Astana, like it was a centerpiece of that diplomatic trip.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 11, the Crown Prince of Abu Dhabi arrived in Astana for an official visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It shows how these international partnerships are moving way beyond oil and gas into the future of energy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It shows how these international partnerships are moving way beyond oil and gas into the future of energy.
